dict.acceptation: 缺乏，不足，没有；缺少的东西；

sent.orig: He often took advantage of her lack of business sense to cheat her.
sent.trans: ４：他常利用她缺乏(lack)生意头脑(businesssense)而欺骗她。

sent.orig: Unemployment, lack of money and lack of support services also featured highly.
sent.trans: 失业、贫穷和缺少支持也是主要原因。

sent.orig: Extroverts tend to lack self-discipline while introverts lack courage.
sent.trans: 性格外向的人缺乏自我约束力，而性格内向的人则缺乏勇气。

sent.orig: Internal defects:lack of penetration,lack of fusion,slag,gas pole,carck,overheating.
sent.trans: 内部缺陷：未焊透、未熔合、夹渣、气孔、裂纹、过热。

sent.orig: Now many young people have no lack of nutrition, what they lack is sleep.
sent.trans: 现在许多年青人并不缺营养，他们缺的是睡眠。
